page.title: 05HEALTH/THE WATER SUPPLY (2)
page.content:
At the works there are four large filter pools .Dirty water filters through 75 centimetres of Belgian sand 5 centimetres of expensive perforated tile and 50 centimetres of gravel .After filtration Chlorine Gas is added to the water to kill off any germs . Large underground storage tanks hold an enormous supply of water including water specially pumped from Loch Katrine .The demand for water is greatest first thing in the morning and between the hours of 5 and 9 in the evening .
{ { By Crookfur Primary School
